results.definition: the physical object that is the product of a newspaper publisher
examples: when it began to rain he covered his head with a newspaper

results.definition: cheap paper made from wood pulp and used for printing newspapers
examples: they used bales of newspaper every day

results.definition: a daily or weekly publication on folded sheets; contains news and articles and advertisements
examples: he read his newspaper at breakfast

results.definition: a business firm that publishes newspapers
